channel.title: Port forwarding
channel.description:
Yesterday I was looking through my router's port forwarding settings and noticed a whole bunch of ports forwarded to different computers in the network, some for uTorrent, some without names, and since I'm the only one with the password to the router I found this odd..
Is there a way to forward ports without having to go into the router and doing it manually?

item.title: Port forwarding
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

If you’re router has upnp enabled certain applications can use upnp to open the ports they need when they need to.

Read full topic
